rev.desc.rev.desc: fixed sql query, it was using old query that would search for screlation for incident id in depend and source, screlation now creates records for both relations so the double query is not necessary.
Pulled array builder out of apm.get.problem.query, so the array of ticket numbers can be found, as well as the query.

descript.descript: fixed sql query, it was using old query that would search for screlation for incident id in depend and source, screlation now creates records for both relations so the double query is not necessary.
Pulled array builder out of apm.get.problem.query, so the array of ticket numbers can be found, as well as the query.
